entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023
